member.name: F:Virus.Core.ArtificialIntelligence.AICategory.Human
member.summary: Human interaction

member.name: F:Virus.Core.ArtificialIntelligence.AICategory.First
member.summary: Choose every time the first card in his hand and the first available move (the Player 0 will suffer almost every time!)

member.summary: Choose randomly one card to play and one random move to this card.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.ArtificialIntelligence.AICategory.Easy
member.summary: Looks for the move with more points to him.

member.name: T:Virus.Core.Body
member.summary: Body. It stores all body items for each organ and modifiers played by a single player.

member.name: P:Virus.Core.Body.Points
member.summary: Points corresponding to the whole body (sum of any body items).

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Body.Items
member.summary: List of body items played by the user.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Body.#ctor
member.summary: Body constructor.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Body.ToString
member.summary: Gets a review of their body items.
member.returns: String with the body items

member.returns: True if the body has a body item of this color.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Body.SetOrgan(Virus.Core.Card)
member.summary: Creates a new body item if the body doesn't contain a body item of the appropiate color.
member.returns: String with the error message if it couldn't be added. Null in other case.

member.param: Index of the body item to use this body iitem.
member.returns: Error message if it couldn't have been played.

member.name: T:Virus.Core.BodyItem
member.summary: A body item, composed by, at least, on Organ and can store the medicines and virus played in that Organ.

member.name: T:Virus.Core.BodyItem.State
member.summary: Possibles states for the body item based on the cards played.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.State.Free
member.summary: Free. Any card played on that organ.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.State.Infected
member.summary: Infected. More virus played than medicines.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.State.Vaccinated
member.summary: Vaccinated. More medicines played that viruses.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.State.Immunized
member.summary: Immunized. Two medicines played on the organ.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.State.NOTINGAME
member.summary: Not in game state.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.Organ
member.summary: Main card of the item: the Organ.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.Modifiers
member.summary: List of cards that have been played to its Organ.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.Points
member.summary: Valuable criteria to clasify this body item. Usefull for AI.

member.name: P:Virus.Core.BodyItem.Status
member.summary: Current status of the body item in function of the cards played on its Organ.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.BodyItem.#ctor(Virus.Core.Card)
member.summary: Constructor of the body item.

member.summary: Set a new medicine to the organ.
member.param: Whole game. It's needed to remove cards when virus are played before.
member.returns: String with a error message if it cannot be added. Null if all right.

member.summary: Return all cards that makes this body item.
member.returns: List of cards with every card on this item.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.BodyItem.RULE_DELETEBODY
member.summary: Static string that indicates computer to remove all the body item.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardColor.Yellow
member.summary: Yellow

member.summary: Green

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardColor.Blue
member.summary: Blue

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardColor.Purple
member.summary: Purple. All threatments have a purple color.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardColor.Wildcard
member.summary: Wildcard color. It can be used like a red, yellow, green or blue.

member.name: T:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace
member.summary: Face of the card. In function of the face, the card could be used of different ways.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.Organ
member.summary: Organ. It makes a body item.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.Virus
member.summary: Virus. It can infect free organs, infected or vaccunated.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.Medicine
member.summary: Medicine. It can remove a virus from an organ or can inmunize a body item.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.Transplant
member.summary: Transplant is a threatment that is used to switch between two body items of the game (no matter if any of they are yours).

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.OrganThief
member.summary: Organ thief allows a player to steal a rival organ and put it on their own body.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.Spreading
member.summary: Spreading is used to move from our own virus' organ to some other rival free organ.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.LatexGlove
member.summary: Latex glove force rivals to discard all their hand.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Card.CardFace.MedicalError
member.summary: Medical error is used to switch your whole body to ahy other of your rivals.

member.summary: Color of the card.

member.summary: Face of the card.

member.name: T:Virus.Core.Scheduler
member.summary:
Scheduler. A class to make order in the calls, messages and parameters that takes in part of the whole game.
The moves are written like: PLAYERID-ORGAN_OR_CARD_INDEX. Many moves are written like: MOVE,MOVE,MOVE...

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.MOVE_SEPARATOR
member.summary: Separator in a move.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.MULTI_MOVE_SEPARATOR
member.summary: Separator of many moves in a same move. (f.e.: transplant requires two moves to anyone: the two body items to switch).

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.CHARS_MEDICINE
member.summary: String to print medicines.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.CHARS_VIRUS
member.summary: String to print viruses.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.ACTION_PLAYING
member.summary: Message that indicates if the user is playing.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.ACTION_DISCARDING
member.summary: Message that indicates if the user is discarding.

member.name: F:Virus.Core.Scheduler.ACTION_CHOOSING
member.summary: Message that indicates if the user is choosing cards.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.GenerateMove(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generate a move string given the Player ID and the card (or organ) number
member.param: Index of card in hand or organ in body.
member.returns: String with the move.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.GetManyMoveItem(System.String[])
member.summary: Get many moves provided in the same string.
member.returns: Single string with many moves provided

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.GetMoveByMultiple(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Get many moves provided in the same string.
member.param: List of moves to be added.
member.returns: One move with all moves indeed.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.GetListOfListsSpreadingMoves(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary:
Gets a list of list of moves to a whole list of moves.
This is usefull to separate the moves when spreading.
A spreading card can spread two viruses from my body, then the list of lists will have 2 list (one to each virus to spread). The list indeed of moves will have a list of possibles cards to this virus could be spread in.
The method gets all possibles moves and this have to separate between appropiates virus. The main reason to do that is because every move in the game is formatted as string, but the spreading move requires more complexity that the others.
member.param: Whole list of moves in spreading to be ordered appropiately
member.returns: List ordered with all the moves provided

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.IntInListString(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Indicates if a List of moves as string contains a specific int in a specific position.
member.param: Index of the character to compare
Int to search in the list.
member.returns: True if the int is the list at this specified index.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.IntInString(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Incidates if a move has a specific int at a specific index.
member.returns: True if the int is in the index.

member.name: M:Virus.Core.Scheduler.GetStringInt(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Get in the move the int which is at specified index.
member.param: Index of the int to retrieve.
member.returns: Int at the specified position
